titles: Good advice to the Church of England, Roman Catholick and Protestant dissenter, in which it is endeavoured to be made appear that it is their duty, principle & interest to abolish the penal laws and tests
author: Penn, William, 1644-1718.
publisher: Printed and sold, by Andrew Sowle ...,
notes: Reproductions of originals in Huntington Library (reel 818) and Harvard University Library (reel 2011).
Attributed to William Penn. cf. BM.
